text: Gabriel "Gabi" Delgado-López (18 April 1958 - 22 March 2020), commonly known as Gabi Delgado, was a Spanish-born German singer-songwriter, composer, lyricist and producer. He was best known as singer and co-founder, with Robert Görl, of the electronic band Deutsch Amerikanische Freundschaft. He was born in Córdoba, Andalusia, Spain. Delgado-López was bisexual. He died on 22 March 2020 at the age of 61.Gabi Delgado (DAF) ist tot ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bisexual people Category:German LGBT writers Category:German singer-songwriters Category:LGBT composers Category:LGBT producers Category:LGBT singers Category:German record producers Category:20th-century German composers Category:21st-century German composers
title: Gabi Delgado-López
